page.description: Places a blank value in the field specified.
page.original:
&ltTBL>.FIELD_BLANK() Syntax &ltTBL>.FIELD_BLANK( Fieldname as C ) ArgumentDescription FieldnameThe name of a field.
Description The &ltTBL>.FIELD_BLANK() method erases the contents of a field. Example Set the logical field "reserved" to be un-initalized (neither TRUE or FALSE). tbl.change_begin() tbl.field_blank("reserved") tbl.change_end(.T.)
See Also Table Functions and Methods
